Clear Paralogue 61: Part 1 on Lunatic difficulty
with an axe ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 61: Part 2 on Lunatic difficulty
with a sword ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Clear Paralogue 61: Part 3 on Lunatic difficulty
with a lance ally on your team. (Allies deployed
as cohorts using Pair Up do not count.) All four
allies must survive.

Gods, have the Risen
spread this far?

Caeda, princess of Talys, invited the dökkálfr
Plumeria to the beach. What memories might
these two make? They appear in Fire Emblem:
Mystery of the Emblem / Heroes.

Volunteer soldier of Altea excited to be taking
her first trip to the beach after having been
summoned. Appears in Fire Emblem: New
Mystery of the Emblem.

Dream-King of Ljósálfheimr, the dream realm,
making an appearance at the beach after being
invited amidst a summer's dream.

Lady of Nightmare who rules over Dökkálfheimr.
What will she dream up under the summer sun?

Mercenary of Talys. Following Caeda, who had
saved his life, he's come to pay a visit to the
summer's warm sands. Appears in Fire Emblem:
Mystery of the Emblem.

The god of Nifl, the Kingdom of Ice. Her frozen
personality is as cold and distant as her realm.

(Harmonized Skills can be used by tapping the
Harmonized button. This skill can be used only
once per map. Harmonized Skills cannot be
used by units deployed using Pair Up.)

Resonance Effect: Mystery of the Emblem /
Heroes
Increases scores in Resonant Battles.
(More details can be found in the Help
messages within Resonant Battles.)

Effective against swords, lances, axes,
bows, and armor—with a Harmonized
Skill that can grant an action too!

Can reduce damage taken and block
effects that prevent her follow-up.
Also mirrors her foe's stat bonuses.

Can effectively get +22 to Def/Res
and easily earns follow-up attacks
to take down his foes!

Can effectively get up to Atk+21 and
Spd+10. Plus, if his Special hits a foe,
he can heal his own HP!

Effective against cavalry foes. If foe initiates
combat or if foe's HP ≥ 75% at start of combat,
grants Atk/Def+5 to unit during combat.

If unit initiates combat or is within 2 spaces
of an ally, inflicts Atk/Def-5 on foe and
neutralizes foe's bonuses (from skills like
Fortify, Rally, etc.) during combat.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat and
neutralizes unit's penalties during combat, and
also, if foe initiates combat, grants an
additional Def/Res+4 to unit during combat.

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25%, grants
Atk/Spd/Def/Res+4 to unit during combat and
inflicts Special cooldown charge -1 on foe per
attack during combat. (Only highest value
applied. Does not stack.)

If unit initiates combat or if unit is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
during combat and reduces damage from
foe's first attack by 30%.

If unit is not adjacent to an ally, inflicts
Atk/Def-5 on foe during combat. At start
of turn, if unit is not adjacent to an ally,
grants Atk/Def+6 to unit for 1 turn.

Neutralizes "effective against flying" bonuses.
If foe initiates combat or if foe's HP ≥ 75%
at start of combat, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6
to unit during combat and neutralizes
foe's bonuses (from skills like Fortify,
Rally, etc.).

If unit initiates combat or if unit is within
2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+6
during combat, and also, if foe uses sword,
lance, axe, dragonstone, or beast damage
and unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd+5, foe cannot
counterattack.

At start of turn, if unit is within 3 spaces of
an ally, grants Def+6 to unit for 1 turn. If unit
is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5
to unit during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is within 3 spaces of
an ally, grants Def+6 to unit for 1 turn. If unit
is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5
to unit during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is within 3 spaces of
an ally, grants Atk+6 to unit for 1 turn. If unit
is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5
to unit during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is within 3 spaces of
an ally, grants Atk+6 to unit for 1 turn. If unit
is within 3 spaces of an ally, grants Atk/Def+5
to unit during combat.

$aEnables【Canto (２)】.

Effective against sword, lance, axe, colorless
bow, and armored foes. Grants Atk+3. If unit
initiates combat or if unit is within 2 spaces
of an ally, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5
during combat.

【Canto (２)】
After an attack, Assist skill, or structure
destruction, unit can move ２ space(s).

(Unit moves according to movement type. Once
per turn. Cannot attack or assist. Only highest
value applied. Does not stack. After moving,
if a skill that grants another action would be
triggered (like with Galeforce), Canto will
trigger after the granted action. Unit's base
movement has no effect on movement granted.
Cannot warp (using skills like Wings of Mercy)
a distance greater than ２ space(s).)

Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, inflicts Atk/Spd/Def/Res-5 on foe
during combat, and also, after combat, if unit
attacked, inflicts status preventing
counterattacks on target and foes within
2 spaces of target through their next actions.
If foe's Range = 2, calculates damage using the
lower of foe's Def or Res.

Grants Atk+3. If unit initiates combat or is
within 2 spaces of an ally, grants Atk+6 to
unit, inflicts Atk-6 on foe during combat, and
unit makes a guaranteed follow-up attack.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

Grants Spd+3. At start of combat, if unit's
HP ≥ 25%, grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+5 during
combat, and also, if unit's Spd > foe's Spd,
reduces damage from attacks during combat
and from area-of-effect Specials (excluding
Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage
= difference between stats × 4 (max 40%).

At start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 25% while
transformed, neutralizes effects that prevent
unit's follow-up attacks during combat.

At start of turn, if unit is adjacent to only beast
or dragon allies or if unit is not adjacent to any
ally, unit transforms (otherwise, unit reverts).
If unit transforms, grants Atk+2, and if unit
initiates combat, inflicts Atk/Def-4 on foe
during combat and foe cannot make a
follow-up attack.

$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+3
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+4
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+5
to unit during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

$aAt start of combat, if foe's HP = 100% or
if【Penalty】is active on foe, grants Def/Res+7
to unit during combat. At start of combat, if
foe's HP = 100% and【Penalty】is active on
foe, grants an additional Def/Res+2 to unit
during combat.

【Penalty】
All effects that last "on foe through its next
action." Includes penalties inflicted by a skill
like Panic or Threaten and negative status
effects (preventing counterattacks, restricting
movement, or the effects of a skill like
Triangle Adept or Guard).

At the start of combat, if unit's HP = 100% and
unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks and restores 5
HP to unit after combat.

At the start of combat, if unit's HP ≥ 50% and
unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks and restores
7 HP to unit after combat.

If unit initiates combat, neutralizes effects that
prevent unit's follow-up attacks and restores
10 HP to unit after combat.

At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-3 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

At start of turn, inflicts Spd/Def-4 on foes within
2 spaces through their next actions.

Grants Res+3. Grants bonus to unit's Atk
= total penalties on foe during combat.
At start of combat, if foe's HP ≥ 75%,
inflicts Spd/Res-4 on foe during combat.

Grants Res+3. At start of turn, if any foes have
the highest Atk or Spd on the enemy team,
inflicts -7 on those foes' corresponding stat
through their next actions. At start of combat,
if foe's HP ≥ 75%, grants Atk/Spd+5 to unit
during combat.
